topic: you have to spend 90% of your time on work, development, and a good plan for your goals, and the rest of your time on your friends
people always talk and scream and complain ,so the plan is don't listen ,just think how you can make yourself better just 1% a day
Don't waste your time thinking about people because they are always gone, So focus on your dreams
we don't know our future but we can help to build it
don't be out the box , you have to destroy it
